a.span: Special Sessions/ Work Study Sessions Page

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.alt: the Quad area of Junction Middle School.

div.p: We are proud of our school and our community. Junction is one of the top performing districts in Shasta County, consistently scoring among the highest performing schools in the North State. Junction met all strict federal guidelines during No Child Left Behind and is one of only 14 percent of schools across the state to meet those requirements. Junction shines as an example of exemplary achievement. Hard work and diligence shows in everything we do. Come see how great Junction School is!

img.alt: Junction Logo and Closure Resources Page

div.p: The Mission of the Junction School District, in partnership with student, family, and community, is to promote excellence, achievement, and self-worth, enabling students to be life-long learners and productive members of our changing world.

span.span: Have you registered on the website?

p.span: Please take the time to register and manage your subscriptions in order to receive weekly updates from Junction School. Detailed instructions can be found by clicking the word register above, or viewing the video below this message. This website was created to not only look good, but to keep our community members involved with our school. If there is any information or photos you would like added to this site, please click on the questions or comments button at the bottom of any page of our website.
Thank You for Choosing Junction School!
